group_1.textRight: I'm sorry... I got saved again...

group_1.textLeft: I simply didn't want anyone else to become a@victim of Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: I have no intention of harming Urara Yume.
All I wanted was to ask her again if she desired@to become a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Is that your excuse for having lured her to a place@liked by Witches?

group_1.textRight: You have it all wrong, and you don't seem to be@listening to me.

group_1.textLeft: That's because conversing with you on the same@wavelength seems to be impossible.

group_1.textRight: It seems difficult to have a calm discussion@with you.
I'll save it for another time.
I'll see you then, Urara Yume.
Umm... Actually, it was me who ventured into@that dangerous place...
I thought back to that previous time I was@attacked by a Witch,
and tried to recreate a similar situation...

group_1.textLeft: Could it be that you were suicidal,@and I interrupted you...?
With that much turmoil, no wonder Witches@have their eyes on you.

group_1.textRight: You see, I actually just wanted to meet those@Magical Girls again.
I wanted to meet the Magical Girls who saved me...
Yeah, so I've been trying to talk about you guys@on the show, hoping you'd hear me,
and doing things every day that might lead@me to Kyubey or the Witches.

group_1.textLeft: And so we got hooked by the bait you set.

group_1.textRight: I didn't know your names, see, so I had no idea@how to find you...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks to you, the students in town now know@about Magical Girls.
Which is a plus for us, too. I'm not complaining.
And just like that, the other two are around@the corner.
If you have any questions, we can introduce@ourselves along the way.
Let's go to a restaurant somewhere and have@a nice talk.
By the way, what do you want to ask?

group_1.textRight: It's about the two Magical Girls who saved me@from the Witch before.
